data.comment: Today's referee, Tim Robinson, has blown to start the match.
Lloyd Kelly (Bournemouth) has received a yellow card from Tim Robinson.
In the minute 12, Stipe Perica is on target to give Watford a 1-0 advantage.
Ismaila Sarr with an assist there.
The away team has substituted Jefferson Lerma with Dominic Solanke. Jason Tindall is thus making his first change.
In the minute 25, At Vicarage Road, James Garner has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The first half has been concluded at Vicarage Road.
In the minute 46, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a first substitution, with Etienne Capoue replacing James Garner.
Tom Cleverley (Watford) has received a first yellow card.
Bournemouth's Diego Rico Salguero has been booked in Watford.
In the minute 64, Domingos Quina is replacing Tom Cleverley for Watford at Vicarage Road.
Bournemouth make their second substitution with Junior Stanislas replacing Arnaut Danjuma.
Stipe Perica, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Joao Pedro is the substitute for Watford.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Diego Rico Salguero with Rodrigo Riquelme. This is the third substitution made today by Jason Tindall.
The match has come to a close in Watford. The final score is 1-1.
Chris Mepham gets an equalizer for Bournemouth. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Lloyd Kelly.
Nathaniel Chalobah is booked for the home team.
